text.text: In the last decade, the retail industry and its incumbents with all its different business models have been gradually disrupted at all levels of their vertical value chain, and that was materializing at a much faster pace than other industries. It took some time for buyers to realize that e-commerce was becoming the engine of the global retail market. The growth was almost never getting under a 2 digits number (YoY) in all advanced countries, and so the future seemed very promising.
